edu.umass.cs.msocket

Class InBufferOutOrder

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.msocket.InBufferOutOrder

  • public class InBufferOutOrder
extends Object
    This class implements the Inbuffer of the MSocket. Out of order data is read from the input stream and stored in the inbuffer.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Emmanuel Cecchet

      Checks if the given data seq num is for in ordered data, if that is the case then it is returned directly from stream and not stored in input buffer.
